definition.zh_def: 紙：用於書寫、印刷或包裝的薄片狀材料，通常由植物纖維製成。
definition.en_def: A thin material made from plant fibers, used for writing, printing, or packaging.
definition.example: She wrote a letter on a piece of paper.
